attributes.action: vehicles to allow 5 feet when overtaking cyclists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A problem encountered by cyclists is the closeness of other road vehicles when they overtake.  The French have a law that requires motorists to leave at least 5 feet when overtaking, and this has led to a reduction in the number of accidents involving cyclists.  Similar legislation should be introduced into the UK.
